title: Retry deployment
constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add backend/migration.mo only if an upgrade requires state migration.
Do not edit any frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths (compose/read-only components instead).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implement new product, purchase, entitlement, or upload features unrelated to deployment retry.
